name: Wild Isles (beta)
description:
Wild Isles is a relaxing first person, nature walking simulator. In Wild Isles you will be transported to a procedurally generated island, full of tranquil forests, stunning vistas, spectacular sunsets, and peaceful ocean waves. Lose yourself in the beauty and sounds of nature, explore the island and collect flowers. Unwind from a busy day in this Zen like experience and enjoy the journey.

Message with the developer, leave your game feedback, participate in contests & challenges, and stay up to date with Wild Isles news!

We value your opinions! If you prefer another option for leaving game feature request and feedback (good or bad) please fill out this form. All feedback goes directly to the developers!

We also check our comments here as often as we can and will do our best to respond!

Happy gaming!
